Qwerty
Class PowerUp

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      Qwerty.PowerUp
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleWord, TripleWord
public class PowerUp
extends Actor

Represents the PowerUp in a game of Qwerty which essentially multiples and increases scores of the Players in the game. It extends Actor, but doesn't act.

Author:
Abhishek, Jeffrey, Aneesh
